thread.section_title: ezStorage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezStorage | ezstorage.com | 2 of 57
thread.title: Watchung

author: Watchung
title: Watchung
text: Customer Service reps are knowledgeable and thorough, carefully explaining contracts, costs, operations and responsibilities of renter and facility. CSRs are also experienced with the business of storage and offered helpful suggestions for efficient use of space. The facility is clean, secure, and very easy to use. Large rolling carts, cleaning supplies and easy access loading dock provided. My only suggestion is to change the "secure" door access codes to be person-specific rather than the locker number concatenated with the middle 2 digits of the owner's SSN.
